title: 我的世界启动不了
author: 米铭
txt_content: 那个启动时就显示Forge Mod Loader has found a prodlem with uour minecraft ihstallation  Thaumoraft:anyThe file FoegemodLoader-olient-0.log contains more information怎么弄啊！！！{:10_524:}

replies.author: Darknees
replies.txt_content:
那是你装mod的时候没有装他要用的插件
比如API之类的

replies.author: LawK
replies.txt_content: 需要安装Thaumcraft（神秘时代）模组

replies.author: Impala
replies.txt_content: 你下mod有下API之类的东西吗
